name: @progress/jsdo-nsds
description: The Progress Data Source is a TypeScript implementation - Progress Data Source class for NativeScript, Angular. This will provide a seamless integration between OpenEdge (Progress Data Object) with NativeScript

scripts.build:ds: tsc --p ../ng-datasource && mkdirp build && ncp ../ng-datasource/tsFiles/progress.data.ng.ds.js build/progress.data.ng.ds.js && ncp ../ng-datasource/tsFiles/progress.data.ng.ds.d.ts build/progress.data.ng.ds.d.ts
scripts.build:jsdo-angular: npm run build:ds && mkdirp build/packages && ncp ../angular build/packages/jsdo-angular && mkdirp build/packages/jsdo-angular/lib && ncp build/progress.data.ng.ds.js build/packages/jsdo-angular/lib/progress.data.angular.js && mkdirp build/packages/jsdo-angular/typings && ncp build/progress.data.ng.ds.d.ts build/packages/jsdo-angular/typings/progress.data.angular.d.ts && ncp ../../LICENSE build/packages/jsdo-angular/LICENSE
scripts.pack:jsdo-angular: npm run build:jsdo-angular && cd build/packages && npm pack ./jsdo-angular
scripts.test:tc-smokes: npm run build:ds && mocha test/smoke*.js --recursive --reporter mocha-teamcity-reporter

author: Progress Software
